content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 8, Santos 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 8, Santos 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Vladimir.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Jean Marie Dongou.
Offside, Santos. Giva tries a through ball, but Pedro Castro is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Cicinho.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Cicinho.
Foul by Marc Bartra (Barcelona).
Victor Andrade (Santos) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Barcelona 8, Santos 0. Jean Marie Dongou (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas.
Victor Andrade (Santos) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Marc Bartra (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Victor Andrade (Santos).
Attempt saved. Cícero (Santos) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Corner,  Santos. Conceded by Adriano.
Corner,  Santos. Conceded by Pinto.
Attempt saved. Edu Dracena (Santos) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Eugenio Mena with a cross.
Foul by Alexandre Song (Barcelona).
Leo Cittadini (Santos) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Substitution, Barcelona. Bagnack replaces Javier Mascherano.
Substitution, Santos. Victor Andrade replaces Walter Montillo.
Substitution, Santos. Pedro Castro replaces Willian José.
Attempt missed. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from more than 35 yards misses to the right. Assisted by Dani Nieto.
Goal!  Barcelona 7, Santos 0. Adriano (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Neymar following a corner.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Edu Dracena.
Substitution, Barcelona. Dani Nieto replaces Alexis Sánchez.
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from outside the box from a direct free kick.
Jean Marie Dongou (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Cícero (Santos).
Goal!  Barcelona 6, Santos 0. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Neymar.
Foul by Alexandre Song (Barcelona).
Walter Montillo (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Walter Montillo (Santos) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cicinho.
Substitution, Santos. Alan Santos replaces Arouca.
Substitution, Barcelona. Jean Marie Dongou replaces Lionel Messi.
Giva (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona).
Attempt blocked. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Cesc Fàbregas with a through ball.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Edu Dracena.
Corner,  Santos. Conceded by Pinto.
Attempt saved. Willian José (Santos) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Foul by Alexandre Song (Barcelona).
Leo Cittadini (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Adriano (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Foul by Cicinho (Santos).
Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 5, Santos 0. Cesc Fàbregas (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Sergi Roberto.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Walter Montillo (Santos) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Neymar (Barcelona).
Cicinho (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Giva (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona).
Substitution, Barcelona. Cesc Fàbregas replaces Xavi.
Substitution, Santos. Gustavo Henrique replaces Léo.
Second Half begins Barcelona 4, Santos 0.
Substitution, Santos. Eugenio Mena replaces Durval.
Substitution, Barcelona. Sergi Roberto replaces Andrés Iniesta.
Substitution, Santos. Giva replaces Neilton.
Substitution, Barcelona. Neymar replaces Pedro.
Substitution, Santos. Cicinho replaces Rafael Galhardo.
Substitution, Santos. Vladimir replaces Aranha.
Substitution, Barcelona. Alexandre Song replaces Sergio Busquets.
Substitution, Barcelona. Marc Bartra replaces Gerard Piqué.
Substitution, Barcelona. Pinto replaces Víctor Valdés.
Substitution, Santos. Leo Cittadini replaces Leandrinho.
Substitution, Barcelona. Adriano replaces Jordi Alba.
Substitution, Barcelona. Martín Montoya replaces Dani Alves.
First Half ends, Barcelona 4, Santos 0.
Foul by Arouca (Santos).
Xavi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Neilton (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Neilton (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta.
Substitution, Santos. Willian José replaces Thiago Ribeiro.
Attempt missed. Rafael Galhardo (Santos) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Cícero.
Goal!  Barcelona 4, Santos 0. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Jordi Alba.
Foul by Durval (Santos).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez with a headed pass.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Rafael Galhardo.
Foul by Thiago Ribeiro (Santos).
Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Goal!  Barcelona 3, Santos 0. Alexis Sánchez (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi following a fast break.
Neilton (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Thiago Ribeiro.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Edu Dracena.
Leandrinho (Santos) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Mascherano (Barcelona).
Own Goal by Léo, Santos.  Barcelona 2, Santos 0.
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Santos 0. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from a difficult angle on the left to the centre of the goal.
Attempt missed. Pedro (Barcelona) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Alexis Sánchez.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dani Alves with a cross.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
